name: TheWeatherNetworkNationalNews(Canada)
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Follow the latest National Weather Network News with Alexa's Flash Briefing.

After enabling the skill, ask Alexa for your flash briefing, to go beyond the forecast with a comprehensive look at breaking weather news, climate change reporting and environmental stories from Canada's weather leader. 

Under settings in your Alexa app, once you find the flash briefing, you can move The Weather Network News to the top of your news briefing list.

Your weather when it really matters, The Weather Network.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
